Battle: (sma) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4

Mean: -1 Persuasion
Professional (Athletics): +2 Athletics step
Ugly+: -2 Persuasion

Flight: Uses Athletics for flight maneuvers

Features

Followers: Has 5 soldier followers
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Sidekick: Has special bond with companion
